description: Deep within the Whispering Woods lie the crumbling remains of a long-forgotten civilization. Stone structures are overgrown with vines and moss, hinting at a mysterious past.
name: Ancient Ruins

burial_niches.description: This chamber is lined with hundreds of small, square niches carved into the stone, likely for holding the ashes of the dead. Most have been looted or disturbed.
burial_niches.name: Burial Niches

central_plaza.description: A large, open plaza paved with cracked flagstones. In the center stands the base of a destroyed statue. Collapsed buildings surround the plaza.
central_plaza.name: Central Plaza

crumbling_wall.description: A section of what was once a formidable stone wall lies before you, now breached in several places. Strange carvings are barely visible. A path leads north to a central plaza.
crumbling_wall.name: Crumbling Wall

crypt_lower_level.description: Deeper in the crypt, the air is colder. More sarcophagi are here, some broken open. A faint draft from the northwest hints at a hidden passage.
crypt_lower_level.name: Crypt - Lower Level

crypt_upper_level.description: You stand in a grand burial chamber. Stone sarcophagi line the walls, their lids heavy with dust. The air is deathly still. Another flight of stairs leads deeper down.
crypt_upper_level.name: Crypt - Upper Level

final_tunnel.description: The worked stone of the ruins gives way completely to natural rock here. The passage ahead clearly leads into the Shadow Caves.
final_tunnel.name: Connecting Tunnel

flooded_tomb.description: This section of the crypt is partially flooded with stagnant, murky water. Sarcophagi jut out of the water like islands. The air is heavy with the smell of mildew.
flooded_tomb.name: Flooded Tomb

guard_tower_base.description: The base of a ruined guard tower. Rubble blocks most of the interior, but a narrow, unstable staircase seems to lead upwards.
guard_tower_base.name: Guard Tower Base

guard_tower_top.description: From the precarious top of the ruined tower, you get a view of the surrounding ruins and the dense forest canopy stretching out in all directions.
guard_tower_top.name: Guard Tower Top

library_ruins.description: This collapsed building might have once been a repository of knowledge. Scraps of decayed parchment and broken shelves litter the floor. A doorway leads north to a smaller room.
library_ruins.name: Library Ruins

overgrown_courtyard.description: Once a manicured garden, this area is now choked with weeds and vines growing between cracked paving stones. A broken fountain sits in its center, dry and filled with leaves.
overgrown_courtyard.name: Overgrown Courtyard

ritual_chamber.description: This circular chamber has a large stone altar at its center, stained with something dark. Faded, unsettling symbols are etched into the floor and walls.
ritual_chamber.name: Ritual Chamber

ruins_approach.description: The trees thin slightly, revealing scattered, moss-covered stones - the first signs of ancient construction. A crumbling wall to the north marks the outer boundary of the complex.
ruins_approach.name: Approach to the Ruins

scriptorium.description: A smaller room adjoining the library, likely where scribes worked. Stone desks are overturned, and dried inkwells lie scattered among the debris.
scriptorium.name: Ruined Scriptorium

secret_passage.description: This rough-hewn passage seems to connect the ancient crypt to the natural cave systems. The air feels slightly fresher here.
secret_passage.name: Secret Passage

shadowy_crypt_entrance.description: A dark, gaping entryway leads down beneath the plaza. The air flowing out is cold and smells of dust and decay. Stone steps descend into blackness.
shadowy_crypt_entrance.name: Shadowy Crypt Entrance
